Author: hamsterolic
Text: god this is literally me. I've had shitty eating issues since I was like 12 and looking back on those years I was actually fucking thin but my binge- restrict cycle bullshit since then has been raising my weight steadily and screwing up my metabolism so much compared to if I'd just have stuck to how I always used to eat. Don't even want to think about weight I'd be today if I wasn't so messed up.
